ygData.subject: Vulois to Windrazor
ygData.msgSnippet: Vulois looks at Windrazor, with caring in his eyes. I know you want to help, but you have alot of anger. at the Alliance for killing Soundwave. At me for not

Subject: Vulois to Windrazor
Message-ID: <8neeib+cj1i@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Vulois looks at Windrazor, with caring in his eyes.

"I know you want to help, but you have alot of anger. at the Alliance 
for killing Soundwave. At me for not allowing you to attack. Even at 
Soundwave, for dying and making you feel this way. But you have to 
brush it aside if you want to help Soundwave's cause. You need 
extensive training. There is a room that I did not show you on your 
tour. Follow me."
